fine_dining.name: Restaurant Nili
fine_dining.atmosphere: Authentic Lappish decor, cozy, traditional log cabin feel
fine_dining.booking_tips: Very popular, especially during peak season. Book well in advance.
fine_dining.local_tips: Highly regarded for its authentic Lappish ingredients and atmosphere. Offers a true taste of Lapland.

fine_dining.name: Arctic Restaurant
fine_dining.atmosphere: Stylish, modern Nordic design within Arctic Light Hotel
fine_dining.booking_tips: Part of the Arctic Light Hotel, known for quality ingredients and presentation. Chaîne des Rôtisseurs member.
fine_dining.local_tips: Focuses on pure flavors from Lapland's nature and the Arctic Ocean.

fine_dining.name: Rakas Restaurant & Bar
fine_dining.atmosphere: Stunning Scandinavian design, large windows, fireplace, located at Arctic TreeHouse Hotel
fine_dining.booking_tips: Beautiful setting, especially appealing for guests staying nearby. Offers brunch and afternoon tea seasonally.
fine_dining.local_tips: Known for its beautiful presentation and use of local, seasonal ingredients with modern twists.

casual_dining.name: Ravintola Roka Street Bistro
casual_dining.atmosphere: Small, cozy, relaxed bistro feel; counter and table seating
casual_dining.booking_tips: Popular spot for high-quality casual food. Great salmon soup.
casual_dining.local_tips: Combines American, Italian, and local 'Meänperä' influences. Run by chef couple Toni and Sanna.

casual_dining.name: Gustav Kitchen & Bar
casual_dining.atmosphere: Chic, industrial-style decor, velvet booths, trendy
casual_dining.booking_tips: Focus on sharing plates and seasonal ingredients. Good for a stylish yet relaxed evening.
casual_dining.local_tips: A more upscale casual dining option in the city center.

casual_dining.name: Rosso Rovaniemi
casual_dining.booking_tips: Reliable option for pizza and pasta, especially for families.
casual_dining.local_tips: Part of a popular Finnish chain, offers familiar Italian favorites.

casual_dining.name: Monte Rosa
casual_dining.atmosphere: Cozy, traditional restaurant feel; located in Arctic City Hotel
casual_dining.booking_tips: Offers a mix of Italian staples and local flavors.
casual_dining.local_tips: Good option if looking for both Italian and Lappish choices in one place.

casual_dining.name: Yuca
casual_dining.reservation_needed: No (small space, might need to wait)
casual_dining.booking_tips: Surprisingly authentic tacos for Lapland. Limited menu but tasty.
casual_dining.local_tips: A popular spot for a quick and flavorful Mexican fix.

street_food.name: Kauppayhtiö (Pure Burger / Pure Pizza)
specialties: Gourmet Burgers (beef, veggie, vegan options; incl. blue cheese, BBQ)
street_food.seating: Casual, quirky, doubles as music venue/arcade
street_food.local_tips: Considered the best burger spot in Rovaniemi by many locals. Lively atmosphere. Also offers wood-fired pizza.

street_food.name: Scanburger
street_food.local_tips: Another Finnish burger chain, offering quick meals.

street_food.name: Santa's Salmon Place
specialties: Salmon cooked traditionally on an open fire
street_food.local_tips: Offers a unique experience of watching salmon cook over flames in a kota setting. Popular tourist spot.

street_food.name: Local Grill Kiosks ('Grilli')
street_food.local_tips: Classic Finnish late-night food experience. Look for local favorites.

coffee_shops.name: Cafe & Bar 21
coffee_shops.local_tips: Popular spot known for good coffee, food, and cocktails. Feels cosmopolitan for Rovaniemi.

coffee_shops.name: Loft Cafe
coffee_shops.specialty: Cozy Cafe in Santa Claus Village
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Warm, cozy, upstairs location in Santa's Gift House
coffee_shops.local_tips: Good place to warm up and relax while visiting Santa Claus Village. Has a Finnish design corner.

coffee_shops.name: Coffee House Rovaniemi
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Standard modern coffee shop chain feel
coffee_shops.local_tips: Reliable chain option for coffee and light snacks in the city center (Lordi's Square).

coffee_shops.name: Korundi Kitchen & Café
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Modern, artistic setting within Korundi House of Culture
coffee_shops.local_tips: Good spot for lunch or coffee when visiting Korundi Art Museum. Known for fresh lunch options.

bars.name: Kauppayhtiö
bars.atmosphere: Quirky, eclectic decor (furniture for sale), arcade games, lively, alternative
bars.food_options: Excellent Burgers (Pure Burger), Pizza (Pure Pizza), Wings
bars.local_tips: A Rovaniemi institution. Great for a casual beer, burger, and potentially some music. Unique vibe.

bars.name: Oliver's Corner Irish Pub
bars.atmosphere: Classic Irish pub decor, often busy, sports shown
bars.local_tips: Popular and centrally located Irish pub for a pint.

bars.name: Uitto Pub
signature_drinks: Good selection of Finnish and international beers
bars.atmosphere: Traditional Finnish pub style, relaxed, popular with locals
bars.local_tips: A more local-feeling pub experience compared to the Irish pubs.

bars.name: Hemingway's Rovaniemi
bars.atmosphere: Comfortable seating, slightly more upscale than a basic pub, relaxed lounge feel
bars.local_tips: Part of a Finnish chain known for a slightly more refined pub/bar experience.

food_tours.name: Rovaniemi Culinary Experiences (Often activity-based)
food_tours.focus: Lappish ingredients, cooking over fire, unique settings
highlights: Cooking and dining in a traditional Kota hut (often part of safari tours)
Learning about local ingredients like reindeer, berries, fish
Dinner experiences focused on Northern Lights viewing
food_tours.booking_tips: Look for experiences offered by safari companies (e.g., Arctic Lifestyle, Safartica, Lapland Safaris) or unique venues (e.g., Arctic SnowHotel). Often combined with other activities like snowmobiling or reindeer sleigh rides.

cooking_classes.name: Lappish Cooking Classes (Limited/Activity based)
what_you_learn: Baking traditional breads or pastries like 'rieska'
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Not as common as dedicated classes in larger cities. Often part of a broader cultural experience or offered by specific hosts/venues. Check local activity providers or Airbnb Experiences.

markets.name: Rovaniemi Market Square (Lordin Aukio Area)
highlights: Seasonal outdoor stalls (mainly summer) selling berries, vegetables, some handicrafts
Focal point of the city center, near shops and restaurants
Christmas Market during December with food, drinks, gifts
markets.best_time: Summer days for produce, December for Christmas market
markets.local_tips: Not a dedicated large food market like in Turku or Helsinki, but the central square area has seasonal activity and nearby shops offer local products.

markets.name: Local Supermarkets (K-Supermarket, S-Market)
highlights: Good selection of local products: Reindeer meat (frozen/cured), smoked fish, rye bread, local cheeses (e.g., Leipäjuusto), berry products (jams, juices), Finnish chocolate (Fazer)
Opportunity to see everyday Finnish food items
markets.hours: Generally long opening hours, check specific store
markets.local_tips: A practical way to buy local delicacies to try or take home. Look for 'Kotimaista' (domestic) labels.

spring: First spring catches of fish (e.g., perch)
Vappu treats (May 1st): Tippaleipä (funnel cake), Munkki (doughnuts), Sima (mead)
summer: Fresh berries: Cloudberries ('lakka' or 'hilla'), Blueberries ('mustikka'), Lingonberries ('puolukka')
Freshly caught fish from rivers and lakes (Salmon, Trout, Whitefish, Perch, Pike)
winter: Leipäjuusto ('Squeaky Cheese') served warm with cloudberry jam
Blinis with fish roe (often featured Jan-Feb)
